Desc.eng: Sir! We have fortified our positions! No one will get through here, I swear.
Great news, captain. It’s time for a great motivational speech, don’t you think?
Send out a patrol to support the adjoining posts!
A word to the wise, you are way too confident, captain. And even hunters get killed if they get too cocky.
I’m going to survey the positions, then I’ll give the orders.
